title: News24.com | WATCH | 'Some of us will starve' - Khayelitsha residents frustrated over looming lockdown
description: Many residents of Khayelitsha in Cape Town are unhappy about the 21-day lockdown.
content:
Many residents of Khayelitsha in Cape Town are unhappy about the 21-day lockdown that President Cyril Ramaphosa imposed on Monday evening.
The president has called on all South Africans to stay indoors starting at 23:59 on Thursday the 26 March. Only a handf… [+1641 chars]
